## Colors

### Primary Palette
| Name | Hex | Usage |
|------|-----|-------|
| Primary | #[hex] | Main actions, links |
| Secondary | #[hex] | Supporting elements |
| Accent | #[hex] | Highlights, alerts |

### Neutral Palette
| Name | Hex | Usage |
|------|-----|-------|
| Background | #[hex] | Page background |
| Surface | #[hex] | Cards, panels |
| Text | #[hex] | Body text |
| Muted | #[hex] | Secondary text |

### Semantic Colors
| Name | Hex | Usage |
|------|-----|-------|
| Success | #[hex] | Positive feedback |
| Warning | #[hex] | Caution states |
| Error | #[hex] | Errors, destructive |
| Info | #[hex] | Informational |
